mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.goods_id,u.user_name AS user_id,t.comment_point,t.comment_info,t.comment_date FROM t_b_comment t,t_b_user u where goods_id = '${_parameter}' AND u.user_id = t.user_id
SELECT count(*) FROM t_b_comment where goods_id = '${_parameter}'
SELECT IFNULL(avg(comment_point),0) FROM t_b_comment where goods_id = '${_parameter}'
